index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF DESIGN CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Central Puget Sound Regional Transit Authority ("Sound Transit"); authorizing the amendment of the "Fourth Supplement to MOA for Intergovernmental Cooperation (April 20, 1998) between Central Puget Sound Regional Transit Authority (Sound Transit) and The City of Seattle for the Central Link Light Rail Project;" and authorizing the acceptance of funds from Sound Transit.
